DEED OF SALE	
This Deed of Sale made on this 15th day of January 2026	
BETWEEN

Ramesh Kumar, Son of Suresh Kumar, aged about 45 years,	
Caste: General, Religion: Hindu,	
Occupation: Business, PAN: ABCDE1234F	
Address: No. 24, MG Road, Bengaluru - 560001	
AND	
PURCHASER:	
Suganthan R, Son of Ravichandran, aged about 22 years,	
Caste: General, Religion: Hindu,	
Occupation: Student / Developer, PAN: ABCDE5678G	
Address: VIT Hostel, Vellore - 632014

Rs. 25,00,000 (Rupees Twenty Five Lakhs only)

PROPERTY DETAILS

East: Plot No. 113

TITLE DETAILS

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have signed this deed on the date first mentioned above.	
SELLER SIGNATURE: Ramesh Kumar
